data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_0
data.text:
WHEN HE HELD ME IN HIS ARMS,
                I NEVER WANTED TO LEAVE HIM... NEVER
                WANTED TO GO BACK TO THAT HOUSE. BUT I
                HAD TO.. THERE WERE RULES TO BE
                FOLLOWED. THE NEXT AFTERNOON....

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_1
data.text: HI! I JUST VOTED MYSELF A COUPLE OF HOURS OFF! HOW'S THE IDLE RICH THIS AFTERNOON?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_2
data.text: BILL! I'M FINE... PUT YOUR SUIT ON, AND WE'LL HAVE A SWIM!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_3
data.text: IT'S MEANT A LOT TO ME, CYNTHY... MEETING YOU! YOU'VE MADE ME FEEL... DIFFERENT, SOMEHOW, ABOUT A LOT OF THINGS!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_4
data.text: I'M GLAD, BILL! YOU'VE MEANT A LOT TO ME, TOO!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_5
data.text:
HIS LIPS CAME SLOWLY CLOSER.
                I WANTED HIM TO KISS ME, BUT I ENJOYED THE
                TINGLING THRILL OF WAITING... I KNEW
                IT WASN'T JUST THE KISS.. IT WAS BILL!!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_6
data.text: I CAN'T KID MYSELF ANY MORE, BABY! YOU MEAN EVERYTHING TO ME... EVERYTHING!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_7
data.text: OH, BILL... BILL..

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_8
data.text:
SUDDENLY, WITHOUT A WORD OF
                WARNING, THE MOOD WAS BROKEN BY A HARSH, BITING LAUGH!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_9
data.text: WELL! OUR GARDENER SEEMS TO BE MOVING UP IN THE WORLD!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_10
data.text: CURT! I DIDN'T KNOW YOU WERE COMING...

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_11
data.text: THAT SEEMS OBVIOUS!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_12
data.text:
STILL WARM FROM BILL'S
                EMBRACE, I WAS CONFUSED AND UNABLE TO THINK. I WANTED TO CALM THEM
                DOWN BEFORE SOMETHING TERRIBLE HAPPENED!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_13
data.text: YOU DON'T NEED TO BE SO NASTY ABOUT IT! OR CAN'T YOU HELP BEING NASTY?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_14
data.text: I SUPPOSE YOU REALIZE YOU'VE JUST TALKED YOURSELF OUT OF A JOB!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_15
data.text: WAIT... PLEASE! PLEASE, BILL... DON'T!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_16
data.text:
I SHOULD HAVE SPOKEN UP
                AGAINST GLORIA AT ONCE, BUT I WAS SO AFRAID BILL WOULD
                LEAVE.. AND I WANTED TO CALM HER DOWN. I DIDN'T EXPECT
                BILL'S REACTION!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_17
data.text: DON'T BE ANGRY, GLORIA...

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_18
data.text: COME, CURT! IT'S NOT GOOD TASTE TO ARGUE WITH THE HIRED HELP!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_015_19
data.text: HOLD IT, YOU TWO! AS LONG AS I'M BEING CANNED, I MIGHT AS WELL GET A FEW THINGS OFF MY CHEST! YOU'RE ALL A LOT OF PHONIES, AND I WAS GETTING SICK OF YOU, ANYWAY!
